advisories.impact: A malicious app may be able to observe user data in log entries related to accessibility notifications
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.impact: An unprivileged app may be able to log keystrokes in other apps including those using secure input mode
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

cves.credit: Stephan Casas and an anonymous researcher

advisories.impact: Entitlements and privacy permissions granted to this app may be used by a malicious app
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A downgrade issue affecting Intel-based Mac computers was addressed with additional code-signing restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Wojciech Regula of SecuRing (wojciechregula.blog) and Kirin (@Pwnrin)

advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to inject keystrokes by spoofing a keyboard
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing a file may lead to unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: m4yfly with TianGong Team of Legendsec at Qi'anxin Group

advisories.impact: Processing a file may lead to a denial-of-service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: m4yfly with TianGong Team of Legendsec at Qi'anxin Group
m4yfly with TianGong Team of Legendsec at Qi'anxin Group

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access Bluetooth-connected microphones without user permission
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

cves.credit: Guilherme Rambo of Best Buddy Apps (rambo.codes)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app from a standard user account may be able to escalate privilege after admin user login
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: Processing a file may lead to a denial-of-service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to access Find My data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access a user's Photos Library
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: Processing an image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Junsung Lee working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Zhenjiang Zhao of pangu team, Qianxin, and Amir Bazine and Karsten König of CrowdStrike Counter Adversary Operations

advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Junsung Lee working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative, Amir Bazine and Karsten König of CrowdStrike Counter Adversary Operations, Dohyun Lee (@l33d0hyun), and Lyutoon and Mr.R

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause unexpected system termination or write kernel memory
advisories.description: A memory corruption vulnerability was addressed with improved locking.

advisories.impact: An attacker with arbitrary kernel read and write capability may be able to bypass kernel memory protections. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been exploited.
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted ZIP archive may bypass Gatekeeper checks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code out of its sandbox or with certain elevated privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved handling of temporary files.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

cves.credit: Meysam Firouzi @R00tkitsmm working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: An app may be able to create symlinks to protected regions of the disk
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved handling of symlinks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in OpenSSH
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating to OpenSSH 9.6.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to overwrite arbitrary files
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: An injection issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed by removing vulnerable code and adding additional checks.

advisories.impact: Photos in the Hidden Photos Album may be viewed without authentication
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing malicious input may lead to code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: An attacker with arbitrary kernel read and write capability may be able to bypass kernel memory protections. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been exploited.
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Private Browsing tabs may be accessed without authentication
advisories.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to edit NVRAM variables
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to capture a user's screen
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved handling of temporary files.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved file handling.

advisories.impact: Third-party shortcuts may use a legacy action from Automator to send events to apps without user consent
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by adding an additional prompt for user consent.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access information about a user's contacts
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved data protection.

cves.credit: K宝 and LFY@secsys from Fudan University

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to a device may be able to use Siri to access private calendar information
advisories.description: A lock screen issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An attacker with physical access may be able to use Siri to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management.

advisories.impact: An attacker may gain access to protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to view Mail data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed by not logging contents of text fields.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by adding an additional prompt for user consent.

advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to read information belonging to another user
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing additional entitlements.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Deutsche Telekom Security GmbH sponsored by Bundesamt für Sicherheit in der Informationstechnik

advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A malicious website may exfiltrate audio data cross-origin
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may prevent Content Security Policy from being enforced
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted webpage may be able to fingerprint the user
advisories.description: An injection issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may prevent Content Security Policy from being enforced
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.
